text: America's Next Top Model, Cycle 6 is the sixth season of America's Next Top Model. This cycle includes 13 contestants. The winner was 18-year-old Danielle Evans. ==Contestants== (In order or elimination) * Kathy Hoxit * Wendy Wiltz * Kari Schmidt * Gina Choe * Mollie Sue Steenis-Gondi * Leslie Mancia * Brooke Staricha * Nnenna Agba * Furonda Brasfield * Sara Albert * Jade Cole * Joan Ann "Joanie" Dodds * Danielle "Dani" Evans ==Prizes== * A modeling contract with Ford Models * A spread in Elle Magazine * A US$100,000 contract with CoverGirl ==Episodes== 1\. casting episode 2\. *Best: Nnenna Agba *Worst: Furonda Brasfield & Kathy Hoxit *Eliminated: Kathy Hoxit 3\. *Best: Brooke Staricha *Worst: Wendy Wiltz & Jade Cole *Eliminated: Wendy Wiltz 4\. *Best: Jade Cole *Worst: Gina Choe & Kari Schmidt *Eliminated: Kari Schmidt 5\. *Best: Furonda Brasfield *Worst: Brooke Staricha & Gina Choe *Eliminated: Gina Choe 6\. *Best: Furonda Brasfield *Worst: Mollie Sue Steenis-Gondi & Jade Cole *Eliminated: Mollie Sue Steenis-Gondi 7\. *Best: Joanie Dodds *Worst: Sara Albert & Leslie Mancia *Eliminated: Leslie Mancia 8\. *Best: Joanie Dodds *Worst: Brooke Staricha & Jade Cole *Eliminated: Brooke Staricha 9\. *Best: Dani Evans *Worst: Nnenna Agba & Furonda Brasfield *Eliminated: Nnenna Agba 10\. *Best: Joanie Dodds *Worst: Furonda Brasfield & Jade Cole *Eliminated: Furonda Brasfield 11\. *Best: Joanie Dodds *Worst: Dani Evans & Sara Albert *Eliminated: Sara Albert 12\. *Best: Joanie Dodds *Worst: Dani Evans & Jade Cole *Eliminated: Jade Cole *Final Two: Dani Evans & Joanie Dodds *Winner: Dani Evans 06
title: America's Next Top Model, Cycle 6
